inputs.name: Records per page
inputs.help_text: Allows to customize the number of records displayed in the page.

inputs.name: Search
inputs.validation: Basic Search or Advanced Search expressions
inputs.help_text: Allows to search devices based on the MAC Address, IP Address, or other device attributes.

inputs.name: Time-Bound Approve Selected Devices
inputs.validation: Requires start date, end date, and time zone.
inputs.help_text: Allows to select and approve devices for a specified time period.

inputs.name: Add Device
inputs.validation: Requires MAC Address, Manufacturer, Operating system, category, IP Address, and Profiler Name.
inputs.help_text: Allows to add new devices and override automatic updates by the profiler.

actions.description: Allows to manually approve or unapprove the selected devices.
Allows to download and save the report in CSV format.
Allows to download and save the report in PDF format.
Allows to delete the selected devices.

actions.enabled_when: Devices are older than the specified interval
actions.description: Allows to manually purge devices older than the specified interval.

constraints: Unapproved devices are indicated in Red.
Time-Bound Approved devices are indicated in Yellow.
Maximum number of entries to download as PDF is 30K.
Scheduled purging of devices happens automatically.

errors.trigger: Incorrect start date, end date, or time zone.
Missing required attributes like MAC Address or Profiler Name.

workflows.name: Device Discovery Workflow
steps: Navigate to Device Discovery Report Table.
Approve, unapprove, or time-bound approve devices.
Download reports in CSV or PDF format.
prerequisites: Devices must be discovered in the network.
